description: This table contains the Medicare-Medicaid dual eligibility statuses for patients.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MCARE_MCAID_DUAL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Medicare and Medicaid dual eligibility status category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Medicaid status


Eligible - QMB only (partial dual)


Eligible - QMB and Medicaid (full dual)


Eligible - SLMB only (partial dual)


Eligible - SLMB and Medicaid (full dual)


Eligible - QDWI (partial dual)


Eligible - Qualifying individuals (partial dual)


Eligible - Other dual eligibles with Medicaid (full dual)


Eligible - Other dual eligibles without Medicaid (non-dual)


Other full dual


Unknown

columns.name: MCARE_MCAID_DUAL_START_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient's Medicare and Medicaid dual eligibility status starts.

columns.name: MCARE_MCAID_DUAL_END_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient's Medicare and Medicaid dual eligibility status ends.
